mapper.select: SELECT TMG_F_GET_ME_NAME ( TDLG_CMODIFIERUSERID, TO_DATE( '2020/06/10', 'yyyy/MM/dd' ), 0, '01', '01' ) AS MODIFIERUSERID, TO_CHAR( TDLG_DMODIFIEDDATE, 'yyyy/mm/dd hh24:mi:ss' ) AS MODIFIEDDATE, TDLG_CMODIFIEDDETAIL FROM TMG_DATEOFEMP_LOG WHERE TDLG_CCUSTOMERID = #{custId} AND TDLG_CCOMPANYID = #{compId} AND TDLG_CEMPLOYEEID = #{empId} AND TDLG_DSTARTDATE <= TRUNC( TO_DATE( #{baseDate}, 'yyyy/MM/dd' ), 'MM' ) AND TDLG_DENDDATE >= TRUNC( TO_DATE( #{baseDate}, 'yyyy/MM/dd' ), 'MM' ) ORDER BY TDLG_DMODIFIEDDATE DESC ;
